text: 2.31: Sng 16.10; FG 13.35Devit maaŋ muuŋgiap kaŋgiap, ana mba kameŋ suaŋgi. Ana Fhe Bakɨme taagiap kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma, ana ana bun nzuai.2.31 “Mba Fhe Bakɨme taagip won gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarav sarigi guma,” mbe Grikin kaman khaŋ zɨn ana kaai, “Krais.”  Ana rimgip, taagip khavgirga. Ana rimgip za mba vhɨzi gumgi ki ŋgun kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ana vhɨra rimgip khurgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
